originalTitle: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
title: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
content: This is the highest number of confirmed casualties from a single African country in the Ukraine-Russia war.

originalTitle: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
title: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
content: He used the girls' mother's life-threatening illness as an opportunity to demand sex, said the US Office of Public Affairs.

originalTitle: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
title: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
content: The disgraced financier was in talks to buy luxury abode Bin Ennakhi - but the purchase was never completed.

originalTitle: Peace ‘within reach’ as Iran agrees no nuclear material stockpile: Oman FM
title: Peace ‘within reach’ as Iran agrees no nuclear material stockpile: Oman FM
content: Oman's Foreign Minister says most recent indirect talks between US, Iran 'really advanced, substantially'.

originalTitle: Trump administration charges 30 more people for Minnesota church protest
title: Trump administration charges 30 more people for Minnesota church protest
content: The expanded indictment targets protesters who rallied at Cities Church in St Paul against Trump's immigration surge.

originalTitle: Trump, Iran and geopolitical mind games
title: Trump, Iran and geopolitical mind games
content: Incoherent messaging and inconsistent policy positions - Trump’s chaotic Iran gambit.

originalTitle: Bill Clinton asked about hot tub photo and testifies he knew 'nothing' of Epstein crimes
title: Bill Clinton asked about hot tub photo and testifies he knew 'nothing' of Epstein crimes
content: The former president told the committee that he would never have flown on Epstein's plane if he "had any inkling of what he was doing".

originalTitle: Trump 'not thrilled' with Iran after latest talks on nuclear programme
title: Trump 'not thrilled' with Iran after latest talks on nuclear programme
content: President Trump said he was not happy with Iran's stance, but had not yet decided whether to attack.

originalTitle: At least 11 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
title: At least 11 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
content: The cargo plane crashed while landing in the city of El Alto, reportedly hitting vehicles on a motorway.

title: Emery's title 'dream' over - but will Villa salvage top-five hopes?
content: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery concedes his Premier League title "dreams" are over, but will the club resurrect their Champions League hopes?

originalTitle: Chelsea to face holders PSG in Champions League last 16
title: Chelsea to face holders PSG in Champions League last 16
content: Chelsea will play holders Paris St-Germain in the Champions League last 16 while Manchester City will face Real Madrid in the knockout stages for a fifth straight season.

originalTitle: Gordon needs to stay 'fully focused' after Arsenal talk - Howe
title: Gordon needs to stay 'fully focused' after Arsenal talk - Howe
content: Head coach Eddie Howe has urged Anthony Gordon to stay "fully focused" after the Newcastle United forward was linked with a move to Arsenal.
